title: Silver 1 - paired with plats??!!
body:
Hey guys! 

I've just finished my promo to get into silver 1. 

My first ranked game in Silver 1, and I get put in a game with 1 gold and 3plats vs 1 gold and 4 plats. 

Wtf happened to my mmr!?!! Haha. I was so surprised! And my team mates moreso when they learned i was "only" silver 1!

replies.body: It's okay. Plats are all boosted scrubs anyway ;^D

Im not an expert, but here's my theory.

When in the fifth tier of a rank you will not drop till your mmr reaches the fifth tier of the rank below. So those plats were actually very close to dropping into gold and their mmr was ~G5 therefore you, with silver 1+ mmr could be matched with them.

Also probably a really rare occurence, maybe not many players at the time
